reqs:
RHSC 500 will start on Tuesday, September 10, 2013. (not September 3th)
This version of the course is not for MRSc students.
PLEASE NOTE: This course is only for RHSC graduate students. It is not open to graduate students from other faculties.
description: Issues relevant to clinical investigations in rehabilitation. Emphasis on research design, measurement issues, selection of analytical approaches, and relevant epidemiological concepts.
